53  
记住这个公式你就可以算！  

海伦公式：  
\[ S = \sqrt{P(P-a)(P-b)(P-c)} \]  
(P为：  
\[ P = \frac{a+b+c}{2}, \quad a, b, c \]  
为三角形边长)  

那么：  
\[ S_{\triangle ADC} = \sqrt{\frac{1}{2} \cdot (\frac{1}{2} - a) \cdot (\frac{1}{2} - b) \cdot (\frac{1}{2} - c)} \]  
\[ P = \frac{2+4+5}{2} = \frac{11}{2} \]  
\[ = \sqrt{\frac{11}{2} \cdot \frac{7}{2} \cdot \frac{3}{2} \cdot \frac{1}{2}} \]  
\[ = \frac{\sqrt{231}}{4} \]  

\[ S_{\triangle ADC} = \frac{1}{2} \times CQ \times DP \]  
\[ = \frac{1}{2} \times 2 \times DP = DP \]  

\[ DP = \frac{\sqrt{231}}{4} \]  
根据 ①  

\[ S_{\triangle ABC} = 9 \times \text{高} = 9DP = \frac{9\sqrt{231}}{4} \]  

根据 (△)  
\[ \frac{S_{\triangle ABD}}{S_{\triangle MAB} + S_{\triangle ABD}} = \frac{16}{25} \]  

\[ \Rightarrow S_{\triangle MAB} = 4\sqrt{231} \quad (\text{end!}) \]
